replies.bodyText:
Thanks for spotting the typo!
Well, I do not know if this support java.lsp.server in any way. That would be your call to decide.

timeline.bodyText: Consider adding better Javadoc. Description/example of "where/how to register this interface" was something I'd have expected here.
